column4: i know someone just answered me, but i accidently switched channels
how can i switch to a dialog window via keyboard?
thats fucking beautiful considering i have no mouse
thanks asshole
i know how to /join
also, why on earth are you attempting to use xchat without a mouse?
i dont have one available atm
(one might ask why attempt to use xchat *at all*, but that's out of scope here)
haha good one
cause its default in buntu
i know how to do that
kill xchat, install irssi, and use the keyboard for everything
boom, fixed
thing is the only populated and helpful channel in all of freenode happens to be #ubuntu
thanks gordan ill give that a go, i managed to open keyboard shortcuts for xchat and dont see an option for switching already open channels
try something like ctrl-left and right or something
sorry for the attitude, im sure you can imagine having no mouse makes for a bad day
does it?
useful tips are still useless
at some point I unplugged my mouse to plug something else in and never got around to reconnecting it
but, I'm using Unity, which is pretty good for keyboard shortcuts
had this been windows i wouldnt have a problem navigating with a keyboard
because you're more familiar with it
had I been on Windows I wouldn't have been able to navigate it at all, with or without a mouse
